definition: blockage consisting of an object designed to fill a hole tightly, close or secure with or as if with a stopper
details:
noun
- blockage consisting of an object designed to fill a hole tightly
= synonyms: plug
- (bridge) a playing card with a value sufficiently high to insure taking a trick in a particular suit
= example: (bridge) a playing card with a value sufficiently high to insure taking a trick in a particular suit
- a remark to which there is no polite conversational reply
= synonyms: conversation stopper
- an act so striking or impressive that the show must be delayed until the audience quiets down
= synonyms: show-stopper
verb
- close or secure with or as if with a stopper
= example: close or secure with or as if with a stopper
= synonyms: stopple
